main event: A UFO was reported by a witness while driving in North Dakota on October 8, 1961, for a duration of 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as having a disc shape and the size of a dime at arm's length., It was observed first about 30 minutes after sunset., The object changed direction multiple times, stopping and then proceeding in a southeast direction., Witnesses were two reliable airmen from Grand Forks Air Force Base., Preliminary investigations found no apparent explanation for the sighting.
location: 10 miles west of Grand Forks, North Dakota, USA
witness description: reliable airmen from Grand Forks Air Force Base
